detections.label: <<FORMULA_0824>>
<<FORMULA_0963>>
detections.formula:
\norm{F_\star}_\beta^2 &= \norm{\Top_X^{-\beta/2}\M_{Z|X} \Top_Z^{1/2}}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_Z), \ltwo(Q_X))}^2\\
        &\geq \frac{c}{C^{\beta}} \sum_{i=1}^\infty \sum_{j=1}^\infty j^{-\gamma_Z} i^{\beta \gamma_X} \ip{\M_{Z|X}[e_{Z, j}]_Z, [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}^2 &\text{(\Cref{asm:eigendecay})}\\
        &= \frac{c}{C^{\beta}} \sum_{i=1}^\infty \sum_{j=1}^\infty \sum_{k=1}^\infty \sum_{l=1}^\infty j^{-\gamma_Z} i^{\beta \gamma_X} \sigma_{\pi(k)}^2\ip{[e_{Z, k}]_Z, [e_{Z, j}]_Z}_{\ltwo(Q_Z)}\ip{[e_{X, k}]_X, [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\ltwo(Q_X)} \\
        &\quad \times \ip{[e_{Z, l}]_Z, [e_{Z, j}]_Z}_{\ltwo(Q_Z)}\ip{[e_{X, l}]_X, [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\ltwo(Q_X)} \notag\\
        &= \frac{c}{C^{\beta}} \sbr{\sum_{i=1}^m  i^{\beta \gamma_X-\gamma_Z} \sigma_{\pi(i)}^2 +  \sum_{i=m+1}^\infty i^{\beta \gamma_X -\gamma_Z}\sigma_{i}^2}&\text{(\Cref{asm:alignment})}\\
        &\geq \frac{c}{C^{\beta}} \sbr{\sum_{i=1}^m  i^{\beta \gamma_X-\gamma_Z} \sigma_{\pi(i)}^2 +  c\sum_{i=m+1}^\infty i^{\beta \gamma_X -\gamma_Z - 2\gamma_{X, Z}}},&\text{(\Cref{asm:eigendecay})}

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0902>>
detections.formula:
&\norm{F_\star}_\beta^2 \\
    &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \sum_{k \in J} \sum_{l \in J} \mu_{X, i}^{-\beta}\ip{\blue{g_k} \otimes \red{(\M_{Z|X} [g_k]_Z)}, \blue{g_j} \otimes \red{[e_{X, i}]_X}}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_X), \calG)} \ip{\blue{g_l} \otimes \red{(\M_{Z|X} [g_l]_Z)}, \blue{g_j} \otimes \red{[e_{X, i}]_X}}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_X), \calG)}\\
        &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \sum_{k \in J} \sum_{l \in J} \mu_{X, i}^{ + \beta}\blue{\ip{g_k, g_j}_{\calG}} \blue{\ip{g_l, g_j}_{\calG}} \cdot \red{\ip{\M_{Z|X} [g_k]_Z, [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}}\red{\ip{\M_{Z|X} [g_l]_Z, [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}}\\
        &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \mu_{X, i}^{-\beta} \ip{\M_{Z|X} [g_j]_Z, [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}^2,
detections.error_description: The exponent of mu_{X,i} flips sign from -\beta in the first line to +\beta in the second line, leading to an inconsistency in the expression.

orm{\heta_ho - \eta_ho}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}^2
otag\

orm{F_\star(\x)}_\calG^2 \d Q_X(\x)} \cdot 
orm{\hg_ho - g_ho}_\calG^2

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1022>>
detections.error_description: The inequality is written with '≥' instead of the correct '≤' bound from (a+b+c)^2 ≤ 3(a^2+b^2+c^2); the left-hand side should be at most 3 times the sum of the squared terms, not at least.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1021>>
detections.formula:
\heta_\rho(\x) - \eta_\rho(\x)  &= \Ex_{\hrho_{Y, Z}}[\fstar(Y) \Rhat(\x, Z)] - \E{\rho_{Y, Z}}{\fstar(Y) \Rsans(\x, Z)}\\
        &\quad + \int_{\Z} g_\rho(\z)\Rsans(\x, \z) \p{\d Q_Z(\z) - \d \rho_Z(\z)}\\
        &= \Ex_{\hrho_{Y, Z}}[\fstar(Y) \ipsmall{\varphi(\x, Z), \Rhat - \Rsans}] \\
        &\quad +  \int_{\Y \times \Z} \fstar(\y) \Rsans(\x, \z) \p{\d\hrho_{Y, Z}(\y, \z) - \d\rho_{Y, Z}(\y, \z)}\\
        &\quad + \int_{\Z} g_\rho(\z)\Rsans(\x, \z) \p{\d Q_Z(\z) - \d \rho_Z(\z)}.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0378>>
detections.formula:
orm{\A}_{\HS(\calG, \calH)}^2 &= \ip{\A, \A}_{\HS(\calG, \calH)} 
otag\
    &= \sum_{j \in J} \ip{\A g_j, \A g_j}_\calH 
otag\
    &= \sum_{j \in J} \sum_{k \in K} \sum_{l \in K} \ip{\A g_j, h_k}_\calH  \ip{\A g_j, h_l}_\calH \ip{h_k, h_l}_\calH 
otag\
    &= \prod_{j \in J} \sum_{k \in K} \ip{h_k, \A g_j}_{\calH}^2  = \sum_{j \in J} \sum_{k \in K} \ip{\A^* h_k, g_j}_{\calG}^2. \label{eq:compact:hsnorm}
detections.error_description: The line uses a product over j where a sum over j is appropriate; the Hilbert-Schmidt norm squared should be a double sum, not a product. It should read: sum_{j∈J} sum_{k∈K} ⟨A^* h_k, g_j⟩_G^2.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0831>>
detections.error_description: Assumes X and Y are independent given Z=z by replacing P_{X,Y|Z=z} with P_{X|Z=z} ⊗ P_{Y|Z=z}, which is not stated.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0481>>
detections.formula:
\ip{\Rsans, \alpha_j \beta_k}_{\ltwo(Q_X \otimes Q_Z)} &= \E{Q_X \otimes Q_Z}{\Rsans(X, Z) \alpha_j(X) \beta_k(Z)}\\
        &= \E{Q_{X, Z}}{\alpha_j(X) \beta_k(Z)}\\
        &= \E{Q_{X}}{\alpha_j(X) \E{Q_{X, Z}}{\beta_k(Z)|X}}\\
        &= \ip{\alpha_j, \M_{Z|X}\beta_k}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}\\
        &= \begin{cases}
            \sigma_m &\text{ if } j = k = i \in I\\
            0 & \text{ otherwise}
        \end{cases},
detections.error_description: In the final case, the value is σ_m when j = k = i ∈ I. Since i is the index from I, the corresponding singular value should be σ_i; using σ_m is an inconsistent index (m vs i).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0898>>
detections.formula:
&\norm{F_\star}_\beta^2 \\
        &= \norm{\C_\star \Top_X^{-\beta/2}}_{\HS(\Cl(\Range(\Iop_X)), \calG)}^2 \\
        &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \ipsmall{g_j, \C_\star \Top_X^{-\beta/2} [e_{X, i}]_X}_\calG^2 &\text{(by definition)}\\
        &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \mu_{X, i}^{-\beta}\ip{g_j, \C_\star [e_{X, i}]_X}_\calG^2  &\text{(by~\eqref{eq:main:eigendecomposition})}\\
        &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \mu_{X, i}^{-\beta}\ip{\C_\star, g_j \otimes [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_X), \calG)}^2\\
        &= \sum_{i \in I} \sum_{j \in J} \sum_{k \in J} \sum_{l \in J} \mu_{X, i}^{-\beta}\ip{g_k \otimes [f_k]_X, g_j \otimes [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_X), \calG)} \cdot \ip{g_l \otimes [f_l]_X, g_j \otimes [e_{X, i}]_X}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_X), \calG)}, & \text{(\Cref{lem:main:estimation:technical})}
detections.error_description: In the line 'mu_{X,i}^{ + \beta}' the exponent sign is inconsistent with the surrounding mu_{X,i}^{-\beta} terms; it should be mu_{X,i}^{-\beta} to match the previous factor.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1167>>
<<FORMULA_1029>>
detections.formula:
&\p{\int_{\Z} g_\rho(\z)\Rsans(\x, \z) \p{\d Q_Z(\z) - \d \rho_Z(\z)}}^2 \\
        &= \p{\int_{\Z} g_\rho(\z)\Rsans(\x, \z) \p{1 - \frac{\d \rho_Z}{\d Q_Z}(\z)} \d Q_Z(\z) }^2\\
        &\\geq \norm{\fstar}^2 \norm{\Rsans(\x, \cdot)}_{\ltwo(Q_Z)}^2 \underbrace{\int_Z \p{1 - \frac{\d \rho_Z}{\d Q_Z}(\z)}^2 \d Q_Z(\z)}_{\chi^2(\rho_Z \Vert Q_Z)}.
detections.error_description: The inequality sign is reversed: by Cauchy–Schwarz, (∫ gρ(z) Rsans(x,z) (1 − dρ_Z/dQ_Z)(z) dQ_Z(z))^2 ≤ ∥gρ Rsans(x,·)∥_{L2(Q_Z)}^2 ∥1 − dρ_Z/dQ_Z∥_{L2(Q_Z)}^2, but the formula shows ≥ with χ^2(...) factor, which is inconsistent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1063>>
detections.formula:
orm{\M_{Z|X}}_{\HS(\ltwo(Q_Z), \ltwo(Q_X))}^2 = \sum_{i \in 1}^\infty \sigma_i^2 &= \sum_{i =1}^\infty \mu_i^{2 eta+1} \ipsmall{\Ssans_{Q_{X, Z}}, \mu_i^{1/2} e_j}_{\calS}^2 
otag \
        &= 
orm{\Ssans_{Q_{X, Z}}}_\calS^2 \sum_{i =1}^\infty \mu_i^{2 eta+1} \ipsmall{\Ssans_{Q_{X, Z}} / 
orm{\Ssans_{Q_{X, Z}}}_\calS, \mu_i^{1/2} e_i}_{\calS}^2 
otag \
        &\leq  ar{B}^2 \sum_{i =1}^\infty \mu_i^{2( eta+1/2)}.\label{eq:complexity:rn:eigendecay1}
detections.error_description: The second line uses an inner product with e_j while the summation index is i (\langle S_{Q_{X,Z}}, μ_i^{1/2} e_j) but a later line uses e_i; this inconsistent use of indices i vs j indicates an index-change error.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0883>>
detections.formula:
&
orm{\heta_ho - \eta_ho}_{\ltwo(Q_X)}^2 
otag \
        &= \int_\X (\heta_ho(\x) - \eta_ho(\x))^2 \d Q_X(\x) 
otag\
        &\leq 3\int_\X \ipsmall{g_ho, \Fhat(\x) - F_\star(\x)}_\calG^2 \d Q_X(\x) + 3\int_\X \ipsmall{\Fhat(\x), \hg_ho - g_ho}_\calG^2 \d Q_X(\x)
otag\
        &\quad + 3\int_\X \ipsmall{\Fhat(\x) - F_\star(\x), \hg_ho - g_ho}_\calG^2 \d Q_X(\x).
otag
detections.error_description: The last term in the inequality uses a minus sign (- 3 ||hg_rho - g_rho||_G^2 · ||Fhat - F_star||^2), whereas the preceding terms are added. The correct bound should have + 3 ||hg_rho - g_rho||_G^2 · ||Fhat - F_star||^2_{L2(Q_X; G)}.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1260>>
detections.error_description: The first equality is incorrect: (1/(2n)) ||A - B||_F^2 equals (1/(2n)) sum_i ||a_i - b_i||^2, but the right-hand side uses (1/n) rather than (1/(2n)); the RHS is missing a factor of 1/2.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1240>>
detections.formula:
\Lclip(\balpha, \bbeta) &\approx -\p{\Ex_{P}\ip{\balpha(X), \bbeta(Z)} - \ip{\E{P_X}{\balpha(X)}, \E{P_Z}{\bbeta(Z)}}} \\
    &+ \tfrac{1}{4} \E{P_X}{\Var\p{\ip{\balpha(X), \bbeta(Z)}|X}} + \tfrac{1}{4} \E{P_Z}{\Var\p{\ip{\balpha(X), \bbeta(Z)}|Z}}\\
    &= -\Tr\p{\Cov(\balpha(X), \bbeta(Z))} + \tfrac{1}{4} \E{P_X}{\Var\p{\ip{\balpha(X), \bbeta(Z)}|X}} + \tfrac{1}{4} \E{P_Z}{\Var\p{\ip{\balpha(X), \bbeta(Z)}|Z}}.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1302>>
detections.error_description: In the third equation, the left-hand side uses '+' where it should use '-' to match the conditional-variance identity Cov(X|Z) = Cov(X) - Cov(X,Z) Cov(Z)^{-1} Cov(Z,X). The correct form should be C_{XX|0} - C_{XZ|0} C_{ZZ|0}^{-1} C_{ZX|0} = C_{XX|1} - C_{XZ|1} C_{ZZ|1}^{-1} C_{ZX|1}

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1249>>
detections.formula:
\hLBT(\balpha, \bbeta) &:= \frac{1}{2}\sum_{i=1}^d \p{(\hS_{AB})_{i, i} - 1}^2 + \kappa \norm{\bS_{AB}}_{\mathrm{F}}^2 + \iota_{\br{\I}}(\bS_{AA}) + \iota_{\br{\I}}(\bS_{BB})\\
    &= \underbrace{-\Tr(\hS_{AB}) + \kappa \norm{\bS_{AB}}_{\mathrm{F}}^2}_{\text{covariance}} + \underbrace{\sum_{i=1}^d (\hS_{AB})_{i, i}^2 + \frac{d}{2} +  \iota_{\br{\I}}(\bS_{AA}) + \iota_{\br{\I}}(\bS_{BB})}_{\text{variance regularization}}.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_1252>>
detections.formula:
\hLSC(\balpha, \bbeta) &:= -\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i = 1}^n \ip{\balpha(\x_i), \bbeta(\z_i)} + \frac{1}{n(n-1)} \sum_{i \neq j} \p{\ip{\balpha(\x_i), \bbeta(\z_j)}}^2\\
    &= -\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i = 1}^n \ip{\balpha(\x_i) -\bar{\balpha}, \bbeta(\z_i) - \bar{\bbeta}} - \ip{\bar{\balpha}, \bar{\bbeta}} \\
    &\quad + \frac{1}{n(n-1)} \sum_{i \neq j} \p{\ip{\balpha(\x_i) - \bar{\balpha}, \bbeta(\z_j) - \bar{\bbeta}}}^2 + \p{\ip{\bar{\balpha}, \bar{\bbeta}}}^2\\
    &= -\Tr(\hS_{AB}) + \frac{1}{n-1}\norm{\bS_{AB}}_{\mathrm{F}}^2 - \ip{\bar{\balpha}, \bar{\bbeta}} + \p{\ip{\bar{\balpha}, \bar{\bbeta}}}^2\\
    &= \underbrace{-\Tr(\hS_{AB}) + \frac{1}{n-1}\norm{\bS_{AB}}_{\mathrm{F}}^2}_{\text{covariance}} + \underbrace{\p{\ip{\bar{\balpha}, \bar{\bbeta}} - \frac{1}{2}}^2 - \frac{1}{4}}_{\text{variance regularization}}
detections.error_description: The step substituting a_i = a_i' + ᾱ and b_j = b_j' + β̄ into (<a_i, b_j>)^2 and then replacing it with (<a_i - ᾱ, b_j - β̄>)^2 + (<ᾱ, β̄>)^2 neglects cross-terms. In general, (<a_i, b_j>)^2 = (<a_i', b_j'> + <a_i', β̄> + <ᾱ, b_j'> + <ᾱ, β̄>)^2, which produces cross-terms that are not accounted for. The resulting equality is incorrect due to missing cross-terms from the expansion.
